body.name: Mount-It! Small TV Monitor Wall Mount | Quick Release | Fits 13-32 Inch LCD/LED Screen | Max 33 Lbs | Slim Tilting Design | Easy Installation
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Universal TV Mount: Fits LED/LCD screen sizes 13 15 17 19 20 21.5 24 25 27 32 inches with a maximum weight of 30 lbs. Fits with VESA 75 x 75mm or 100 x 100mm. VESA square bolt pattern is found on the back of the tv/monitor.
Quick Release: This function allows you to easily install and remove the mounting bracket from the wall plate in just a few seconds.

Design: Slim low profile design is 1.75 inches away from the wall. Display screen can be tilted at +5 degrees upward and -15 degrees downward for better viewing. This mount can be used in your bedroom, office, living room, RV, or business.
Easy Installation: Install this mount in minutes. Comes with all mounting hardware, tools and instructions necessary for assembly.
Customer Support and Warranty: Our friendly and responsive customer support team is available to answer any questions you may have during normal business hours and mount comes with a 5-YEAR WARRANTY.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mount-It! Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket 1.7 Inch Low-Profile Design With Quick Release Function, VESA 75 and VESA 100 Compliant, Steel Fits up 32 Inch TVs 30 Lbs Carrying Capacity, Black How do I know this mount fits my TV or Monitor? 1. Measure VESA holes on the back of your TV or Monitor. They must match 75x75mm (3"x3") or 100x100mm (4"x4") 2. Ensure that your TV or Monitor is not heavier than 30lbs! (most LCD TVs under 32” are lightweight) Once, you've checked those two figures, you can be 99% sure our mount will support your screen! When buying a mount, it can seem pretty complicated. But it really comes down to those two things: VESA holes (to screw your mount into your TV) and weight (to ensure your TV is safe on the wall). This high quality tilting wall mount is perfect for computer monitors or small televisions. Featuring a low profile design that sits 1.65" from the wall and the ability to tilt up to 15 degrees, this mount is as functional as it is visually appealing. Made from high-grade steel. Very sturdy and easy to install. Ideal for new and slim LCD and LED TVs. Wall plate dimensions are 3.9" by 3.9". The mount comes with installation instructions and necessary hardware for installation. Buy with confidence. Features / Specifications: - Low-profile design - Tilt downwards 15 degrees - VESA 75 and VESA 100 bolting pattern compatible - Easily installs to one wall stud or concrete, brick wall - 30 lb load capacity - Material: Steel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I knew about this sooner!
reviews.reviewText: This high-quality, super to use product is great. My only complaint is that the screws didn't really work for what I needed. I had to purchase my own screws but, I am still delighted by it, high-quality, good, weight, and size and easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and worked perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Installed this for a TV I put in the bedroom. Mounted to the wall. Was easy to mount and with the detachable mounting plate plate, it was even easier to attach the TV to the wall mount. Gives the ability to tilt up and down so I can get the view right for our TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mounting is solid
reviews.reviewText: It really worked well with my tv. Getting my fingers in the back to install the safety screw was a nightmare. I dropped it about a dozen time before getting it. I wish they had given some leeway with slightly bigger mounting holes so you could adjust the leveling a bit. My tv is a tiny bit crooked. All in getting the holes exactly right, which is hard to do when drilling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It doesn’t actually fit my tv…
reviews.reviewText: But it is solidly made and would have been perfect if I had a different mounting layout distance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and made well
reviews.reviewText: This mount was easy to put up, came with beefy enough hardware that I didn’t need to go to the store for better bolts, and is a nice slim profile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to install in smaller places
reviews.reviewText: Hard to install in smaller places

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This mount is for people who have small to large monitors and or smaller TV’s. I personally have have a 32 inch monitor, and it worked fantastic. The mount comes with the necessary hardware to mount as soon as you receive it. The mount seems to be made of quality metal it feels sturdy. I only wish it came with a couple extra washers but it’s no big deal. This mount only slightly hinges forward and backward so don’t expect a wide range of rotation. Also getting the last screw on top that holds the mount from possibly falling off is kind of a pain to put back in once the mount is on, so I suggest getting a long screwdriver with a magnetic tip so you can put it back in place. Otherwise, you’ll need skinny arms to reach behind. All in all, the mount exceeded my expectations and I’m happy with the price. I recommend you buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very secure and quick to install

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mount, very neat and clean installation
reviews.reviewText: Worked as expected. Very easy to install. Neat and clean mount.I wish it could be "thinner" a little but... In my application, it was sticking out far bit...But it's certainly not a deal breaker. Will buy another one
Muy buen soporte, viene con lo necesario para instalarlo, y el material es de buena calidad
